title: Donald's fire survival plan
creator_credit: Les Clark, Ken Peterson and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: The need for a fire survival plan in the home. Every day over 1500 homes burn, and 18 lives are lost, one third of them children. Schools, industrial plants and public buildings practise proper procedures, why not homes? Donald Duck works out a plan to protect his family in case of fire.
